title: GridMaker: Builds a grid from a vector layer — GridMaker
text: layer simple feature (sf) containing geometry region covered grid. NULL full extend GridMaker EPSG = 3035 res 100 000 grid resolution (pixel size). unit measure expected one CRS. Minimun value allowed 1 epsg 3035 (corresponding ETRS89-LAEA) EPSG numerical code grid CRS. proyected layers allowed tol 0 (buffer layer) tolerance distance keep cells far layer. uses sf::st_buffer() building grid default values. Negative tol possible gt SURF type grid cell geometry: Squared surface representation ('SURF') centroid ('CPT'). tilesize tile size computation done using tiles (strongly recomended big grids). tilesize scale factor eventual tile size = res*tilesize progress FALSE/TRUE show progress case tiling. parallel FALSE/TRUE case tiling, proccess run parallel. Requires "future::plan(multisession, workers = ##)" outside function. ... parameters passed onto buffer tol > 0.
